properties.description: Launch Trampoline Park is a 25,000 sq. ft. indoor sports & family entertainment facility with over 16,000 sq. feet of connected trampolines forming one GIANT jumping surface. Offers Ninja Course, Battle Beam, Jousting area, arcade and full menu Cafe.
properties.name: Launch Trampoline Park
properties.note: Hours: Sunday 10am-8pm Monday 3pm-8pm Tuesday 10am-8pm Wednesday 3pm-8pm Thursday 3pm-8pm Friday 5pm-9pm Saturday 10am-11pm
